traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Eldritch Restoration
traits.description: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in days, reviving with all its in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. , each creature in a 5-foot originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain unless it is underwater. While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes 6 () Acid damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: , reach 15 ft. 12 () Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the condition (escape ) from one of four tentacles.

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.description: , one creature within 30 feet that is or by the aboleth. 10 () Psychic damage. Half damage. The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 by this action.

actions.name: Dominate Mind (2/Day)
actions.description: , one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. The target has the condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While , the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendaryActions.description: If the aboleth has at least one creature or , it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 () .
